Line1.1029AF: Yet I still feel him...I still hear his cries! I will never be free of the truth...
Line3.1029AF: I sent my sweet boy away for a sin of my own making. The blood is on my hands...all of it.
Line5.1029AF: Heavens above, forgive me. I must go visit my son.
VoiceDir1.1029AF: A horse voice full if hysteria, slowly giving way to clarity of purpose.
